channel.title: vietnam on Home
channel.description: Recent content in vietnam on Home

item.title: Visiting the Dragon Bridge in Da Nang
item.description: Although it was raining, the Dragon Bridge was still very beautiful. And how lucky I was that I had the opportunity to see it spit fire and water into the sky.

item.title: Visiting Hoi An accient town
item.description: Hoi An landscape is so beautiful and Hoi An people are so friendly.

item.title: A tour at Vinpearl Nam Hoi An
item.description: There are many interesting activities here. My favorite is visiting the animals at Safari park. The staff took care of them very attentively and carefully, happy to see that.
